FindingName: Exchange Mailboxes with SendAs Delegates Found
Description: The Exchange Online mailboxes listed above have delegated SendAs permissions to another account.
Remediation: This finding refers to individual mailboxes that have SendAs delegated permissions. For these mailboxes, verify that the delegate access is expected, appropriate, and does not violate company policy. Remediation can be accomplished by running the following PowerShell command:  Remove-RecipientPermission -Identity $mailbox -AccessRights SendAs -Confirm:$false -Trustee $member. A list of affected email addresses is included in this report.
